post.body: =( ptsd?
yes, i even done skin examinations. lulz
Totally. =) You rock so much tanith.
omg... epic. lol!
I was only ever able to write if i was in deep depression. Since i turned my life around, I can't write for crap. =)
wow, 320gb... good job. =) gonna be a pretty kickbutt ultraportable.
*virtual tuck-in* =)
you can't be any worse than that =P
Back when I used to do my mohawk somehow the jello would even get on the ceiling. it was crazy... all this purple specks up there.
@dee_pntx my red's already mostly washed out... any tips on preserving it better next time?
Yeah, family is really hard. Well hang in there... you can handle it. =)
omg that's sad, i had no idea
lulz
So... like good rock. lol.
Scary or fun? When i run into old friends and family, i get excited now, cuz i got addicted to coming out. lol
meh, i was on hiatus because it just was too time consuming while i was trying to bust butt with everything else.
ahhh gotcha... what do you spin?
you DJ?
Nope, now it's time to tend to my personal life. lol. It's dating season. =)
I'm done, completemente.
it's probably me mostly... i get busy with all my other dramas... plus finals. How are you, besides beautiful?
They shouldn't have the authority to discriminate though.
I think their big resistance so far was they didn't want to take authority away from the nurse on the floor.
LoL. It's not really hard to believe when you work there.
omg... cutest picture ever
omg... that's wonderful. You have a beautiful family.
ahhhh good ol' irriflattered... I know the feeling well. lol
lol, don't feel guilty. feel happy. =)
The answer is... *drumroll*... yes. It's gone.
lets test that... delete the smiley i just sent you
As long as it doesn't sink to 88... it was stuck at 88 for a few weeks, and i was terrified i'd fall back thru time.
Oh... you're the one who's been doing that? lol. My count keeps going down.
lol, i wanna get a black tree http://tinyurl.com/5pdhjw and decorate it with ravens and red tinsel. Goth xmas tree. lulz
my online speech has been missing particles all over the place lately... for some reason. I'd fix it if twitter were actually functional.
http://tinyurl.com/6dxmsa -- and i thought i was the only one studying chasers. lol
Up, it's what i'm waking.
night all.
Got a date this saturday, that's kinda cool.
In case anyone's still interested in that saga... lol
Legal continues to stall and parry on the trans-segregation issue at work. They haven't approached anything near a real response.
ok... off to work
Not that passing is central to me... just that I'd be a little less genderfuct without it now. lol.
I wear my makeup most of the time, even to the grocery lol, but I'm thinking of trying to cut back. I don't think i need it to pass anymore.
Question of the Day, for transtwitters: How often do y'all go out without any makeup? Do you work without makeup?
note to self: make a conscious effort to stay more on time with your meds.
night all
yay, my pipe decided to clog up right before i started hulu
basically got nothing done today, i should really clean up
bedtime for tamacracy. *naps*
too bad The Blacks broke up so early. =/ http://tinyurl.com/6zqv9l
all of a sudden, i have this odd, unexplained urge to watch Home Alone. Has it become retro yet? The odometer turned over to "cool"
So at least something is happening again. Good news.
Update for the interested: after considerable poking and prodding, the legal dept at my work had decided to review those TG issues.
Ok... off to wipe down the car and get to work... ttyl all
so quiet here today..... everyone must be at church. OMFGROFLMAOLOL!!!1!1eleventyone
i got what I needed... some cuddle... whether he wanted it or not. lol... i am a cuddual offender
I think I like dating slightly more than i hate it.
night all. I'm off to dreamland... where everything is bold and plays out to its full potential.
ok. a quick bite to eat before bed.
weird... twitter stopped updating my facebook. Now all my friends won't know my personal details.
